```{r}
library(readxl)
churn <- read_excel("Churn2.xlsx", sheet = "Churn_Modelling")

dim(churn)
names(churn)
churn = churn[1:9]

churn$Churned_d = factor(churn$Churned_d, levels = c(0,1))

str(churn)

library(caTools)

set.seed(123)

n <- nrow(churn) # Determine the number of rows in the dataset.
n_train <- round(0.6 * n) # Select x% of records in the disease dataset.

train_indices <- sample(1:n, n_train) # randomly select X% of total records.
training_set <- churn[train_indices,] # Create training dataset.
test_set <- churn[-train_indices,] # Create validation dataset.

library(e1071)

#New  Training Vector
classifier = svm(Churned_d~., data=training_set, type='C-classification', kernel="linear")
classifier

y_pred = predict(classifier, newdata=test_set)

#Confusion Matrix
cm = table(y_pred,test_set$Churned_d)[2:1, 2:1]
cm

round(prop.table(table(y_pred, test_set$Churned_d),2),3)[2:1, 2:1]*100

#Accuracy,
diagonal = sum(diag(cm))
Total_matrix = sum(cm)

accuracy = (diagonal/Total_matrix)*100
accuracy

#New Training Vector
classifier = svm(Churned_d~., data=training_set, type='C-classification', kernel="polynomial")
classifier

y_pred = predict(classifier, newdata=test_set)

#Confusion Matrix
cm = table(y_pred,test_set$Churned_d)[2:1, 2:1]
cm

round(prop.table(table(y_pred, test_set$Churned_d),2),3)[2:1, 2:1]*100

#Accuracy
diagonal = sum(diag(cm))
Total_matrix = sum(cm)

accuracy = (diagonal/Total_matrix)*100
accuracy

#New Training Vector
classifier = svm(Churned_d~., data=training_set, type='C-classification', kernel="radial")
classifier

y_pred = predict(classifier, newdata=test_set)

#Confusion Matrix
cm = table(y_pred,test_set$Churned_d)[2:1, 2:1]
cm

round(prop.table(table(y_pred, test_set$Churned_d),2),3)[2:1, 2:1]*100

#Accuracy
diagonal = sum(diag(cm))
Total_matrix = sum(cm)

accuracy = (diagonal/Total_matrix)*100
accuracy

classifier

y_pred = predict(classifier, newdata=test_set)

#Confusion Matrix

cm

round(prop.table(table(y_pred, test_set$Churned_d),2),3)[2:1, 2:1]*100
#Accuracy

accuracy
```
